trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles" /> 類別之 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule" /> 事件的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>物件提供的事件資訊至<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>物件提供存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>目前的要求和`Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>屬性用來啟用或取消建立<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>由<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> of the current request.

Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs" /> class and sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context" /> property to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs" /> 類別的執行個體，並將 <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context" /> 屬性設定為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>物件提供的事件資訊至<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>物件提供存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>目前的要求和`Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>屬性用來啟用或取消建立<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>由<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> for the current request.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> for the current request

The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>物件提供的事件資訊至<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context%2A> property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
The following example shows the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event adds a trace notification for an application where trace is enabled in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>事件加入追蹤通知應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中啟用追蹤的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether role information has been applied to the current user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示角色資訊是否已經套用到目前使用者的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if role information has been applied to the current user; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果角色資訊已經套用到目前使用者，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>屬性用來啟用或取消建立<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>由<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>。

trans-unit.source: If set to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> assumes that role membership for the current user has been verified and any required role membership information has been set up for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為`true`中<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>事件，然後在<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>假設該角色成員資格，目前使用者已經過驗證，以及任何必要的目前使用者已設定角色成員資格資訊。

trans-unit.source: No action is taken by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> to create a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 執行任何動作都由<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>建立<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>目前使用者的物件。
